subject: Hockey, Ice
Concussions
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Penguins star Evgeni Malkin, the N.H.L.’s reigning most valuable player, is among 11 players believed to have sustained concussions in the past two weeks.
snippet: Penguins star Evgeni Malkin, the N.H.L.’s reigning most valuable player, is among 11 players believed to have sustained concussions in the past two weeks.
